maqras.text: 53|26|Arau akasasamuhata asankhya phiraista ache, sihamtara madhyasthata kono kamata nahiba, kintu allahe yaka iccha karae arau yara prati te'om santusta haya tara babe anumati diyara pichata.
53|27|Niscaya yihamte akhiraataka bisbasa nakarae, sihamte'i phiraistasakalaka naraibacaka namerae namakarana karae
53|28|athaca e'i bisaye sihamtara kono jnane'i na'i. Sihamta kerala anumanara anusarana karae; arau niscaya anumana satyara mukabilata kono kamata nahe.
53|29|Eteke tumi se'i byaktika upeksa karaa, yiye amara smaranara paraa bimukha haya arau akala prthiraira jiranake'i kamana karae.
53|30|E'itorae sihamtara jnanara sesa sima. Niscaya tomara pratipalaka, teraemi ata'itakai bhala jane kona te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche arau teraemi bhala jane kona hidayatapraapta haiche.

53|31|Arau akasamandalata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache sakalo allaharae'i. Yate te'om sihamtara kamara pratiphala diba parae yihamte beya kama karae arau yate se'isakala lokaka uttama puraskara diba parae yisakale satkarma karae

53|32|yisakale sarau-suraa dosa-trautira bahirae danara danara papa arau aslila karyakalapara paraa birata thake. Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ksama aparaisima; te'om tomalokara bisaye samyaka aragata—(smarana karaa) yetiya te'om tomalokaka matira paraa srsti karaichila arau yetiya tomaloka matrgarbhata bhraunaraupe achila. Eteke tomaloke atmaprasansa nakaraiba, kone takbaraa aralambana karaiche se'i bisaye teraemi samyaka aragata.
53|33|Tumi se'i byaktika dekhichane, yiye mukha ghuraa'i laiche
53|34|arau kincita dana karaile arau bandha karai dile
53|35|tara ocarata kiba gayebara jnana ache neki, yito si pratyaksa karae
53|36|ne muchara chahiphata yi ache, se'i samparke taka arahita karaa horaa na'i
53|37|arau ibraahimara chahiphata, yijane purna karaichila (te'omra angikara)
53|38|seya haiche ye, kono boja bahanakaraiye anara boja bahana nakaraiba
53|39|arau e'i ye, manuhe se'itorae paya, yito si cesta karae
53|40|arau tara pracestara phala atisighrae'i dekhuraa ha’ba
53|41|tara pichata taka purna pratiphala pradana karaa ha’ba
53|42|arau niscaya tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i haiche sesa gantabya
53|43|arau niscaya teraemi hahuraaya arau teraemi kanduraaya
53|44|arau niscaya teraemi mrtyu pradana karae arau teraemi jirana dana diye
53|45|arau niscaya teraemi srsti karaiche yora-yorakai purausa arau narai
53|46|sukrabindura paraa, yetiya i skhalita haya
53|47|arau niscaya punaraut'thana ghatoraara dayitba'o te'omrae'i
53|48|arau niscaya teraemi abharamukta karae arau sampada pradana karae
53|49|arau niscaya teraemi asba-sbi’raa naksatrara pratipalaka.
53|50|Arau teraemi praacina ‘ada jatika dhbansa karaiche
53|51|arau chamuda jatiko (dhbansa karaiche). Sihamtara ejanako arasista rakha na'i.
53|52|Arau iyara purbe nuhara sampradayako (teraemi dhbansa karaiche). Niscaya sihamta achila atisaya yalima arau carama abadhya.
53|53|Arau teraemi olota'i diya abasabhumika niksepa karaichila
53|54|tara pichata se'ito acchanna karaichila yi acchanna karaibalagiya achila.
53|55|Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara konato anugraha samparke sandeha posana karaiba
53|56|atitata satarkakaraisakalara darae'i e'i nabi'o ejana satarkakarai.
53|57|Kiyamata nikatararti.
53|58|Allahara bahirae kone'o iyaka prakasa karaibalai saksama nahaya.
53|59|Tomaloke e'i kathata bismaya bodha karaicha neki
53|60|arau hamhi-thatraa karaicha! Kanda na'i
53|61|arau tomaloke udasina
53|62|eteke tomaloke allahaka chajada karaa arau te'omra ibadata karaa.
54|1|Kiyamata nikatararti haiche arau candra bidirna haiche
54|2|arau sihamte kono nidarsana dekhile mukha ghuraa'i laya arau kaya, ‘eyato ciraacaraita yadu’.
54|3|Arau sihamte asbikara karae arau nija nija prabrttira anusarana karae, athaca pratito bisaye'i sesa laksyata upanita ha’ba.
54|4|Arau sihamtara ocarata sambadasamuha ahi pa'iche, ya’ta ache satarkabani
54|5|eta paraipurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana sihamtara kono kamata aha na'i.
54|6|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa. (Smarana karaa) yidina ahbanakaraiye ahbana karaiba eta bhayaraha parainamara phale
54|7|apamanita aranamita nayanerae se'idina sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yena sihamta biksipta pharainahe
54|8|sihamte ahbanakaraira phale bhita-santrasta arasthata guci ahiba. Kaphirasakale ka’ba, ‘e'ito bara kathina dina’.
